tweets.html:
MARLA GIBBS IS PLAYING A LESBIAN AND I'M HERE FOR IT. #SCANDAL

— 🌈 M i c h e l l e (@heymeeshi) March 13, 2015

GAY BLACK GRANDMAS DOT TUMBLR DOT COM!!!!! #ScandaI

"It was hard enough being Black. Let alone being Black and gay." Yo. !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Lois was Miss Mary's bae for real. #Scandal

— Awesomely Luvvie (@Luvvie) March 13, 2015

#Scandal keeps ethering all my thug.

— #HalfricanAmerican 🏹 (@lenubienne) March 13, 2015

I wish Liv would wear a ponytail or something to actually illustrate on the outside how she feels. Girl put on some jeans. #Scandal

— Irascibly Ornery Dr. KW (@kristenwarner) March 13, 2015

"I waited over 40 years for my Lois... believe me. I can wait a bit longer." THIS IS SO #ROMANTICAL AND I AM VERKLEMPT!!! #Scandal

That was a lovely backstory. Too bad one of them is dead (sigh). #Scandal

"Hi, I'm Shonda Rhimes. If BROKEBACK MOUNTAIN made you cry, you're really not going to like this episode of #Scandal. Just so you know."

cy and abby are like...uh...do we have to be here? #scandal

NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO #Scandal
